
```python
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('bdm2s2_nation_year_data_may2002.csv')
```

```python
df2 = df[ (df['year']>1970) & (df['ccode']==325) ]
df2['Diff']=df2['CurRevenue']-df2['Expenditure']
print df2[['year','WB_growth','Diff']]
```
